summary: During five years of studying International and Chinese Development with a focus on Gender and Environmental Sustainability I have gained professional proficiency in both English and Chinese and I have put these linguistic skills to good use through various interpretation and translation jobs and projects. I also have internship and volunteer experience in both local and international non-profit organizations in the field of gender.
